story.text: Taking a look at those Vision and Tactics that are heavily solution based. We try and expose the ideas that are surfaced in the [[Principles for Version Two]].
Creating new Wiki, and sharing it with others, needs to be simple. _A tactic that supports simple creation, for a client/server architecture, is 'Farm is the Only Option.'_
Extending the types of content supported with a wiki should be simple. _A tactic to support this is to use plugins for each content type. A technology specific solution is the use of ES6 Module._
